Articles.Content:
You ascend to floor 122, where you find the BSMC secret testing grounds, where a few scientists are testing 10 ton Munar Landers and attempt to hide them behind their backs. You have two options.

A) Get handcuffed by BSMC security guards and returned to level 121

Pull out the sniper rifle you killed Jeb with on page 15 or so and kill one of the scientists to take a Munar lander to level 123.

Edited October 8, 2012 by Bioman222

We were on floor 123 dude. You can only go up and down one level at a time. We're trying to go down but it will take a while.

You kill both scientists and proceed to floor 123, following the voices telling you descend. (I assume you meant 124 since you said ascend.)

Remembering the old man's words, you descend to floor 122, where you find monkeys and Spanish. With a mix of delight and terror, you find that you are in the SQUADÃ¢â€žÂ¢ website. As a kerbal, you feel compelled to stay, but you bravely carry on to floor...
You descend to floor 121. On that floor you find a cute puppy. As you pet it it turns into a zombie and attacks. This puppy will chase you up and down all floors until you kill it.

In panic, you fall down the stairs to floor 120.

You find a smeg head.

You ascend to floor 122 through a secret stable wormhole.

There you find Stephen Hawking.

*Floor 121

You ask him several questions, and after being satisfied, proceed further down, thinking "We must reach the bottom!"

Now on Floor 120...

Zombie puppy is still mauling you and you use your remaining limbs to beat it to death. On floor 119 you find a healing elixir and a case of beer but can only take one. You decide! Party or getting your limbs back!
You take the healing elixir, and ascend to floor 120, where a video of Apollo 18 is playing. And it's the end scene where the guy's in the LK module.

After ascending, you feel a tingy feeling, that makes you want to head down. You think it's just the healing elixir, but you can't resist and so you descend to floor 119.

You find this.
You look at the price and (being a kerbal and missing the decimal point) think that $1000 is way to overpriced. You faint at the cost. When you wake up, you find yourself on floor...
118, where you find a new hat. You put it on. You may now turn any floors into cats.
You descend to floor 117 and make the floor cats, when you remember you have a serious asthma reaction to cats! After 2 hours of nearly suffocating, you stumble to room...

...room...#13 which looks like just another staircase.

You go down to floor 116, thinking you need to escape the cats which are now following you down. You...
You descend to floor 115, followed by the Athena inducing monsters known as cats. You see an array military grade weapons which weren't here before. You proceed to ...
Floor 116, where you use these military grade weapons to destroy the asthma-inducing cats. You proceed to...
floor 115, where you die.
Gandalf saves you, and you proceed to floor 114. on floor 114 you see an Iron Golem and some testificates.
Ignoring them, you drop down to floor 113, and lick some eggs.
It turns out the mods saw you, and the chase you with their banhammers for profanity. Luckily, you escape to floor 112, where you find SNapple self-promoting himself.
You run down the stairs to floor 111. Unfortunately, there are several statues of demons on this floor. Also, there's a sign explaining that the statues randomly come alive, sorry.
You quickly jump down the elevator shaft to get to floor 100, where you find pie heaven.

You quickly jump down the elevator shaft to get to floor 100, where you find pie heaven.

One floor at a time. You meant 110.

You continue downwards to floor 109, where you find Capt. Skunky.
you immediately beg for forgiveness for all your forum shenanigans. you then proceed to floor 108, where you find a shrine to jebidiah.
You run down to floor 107 and find... nothing.
